name: @daostack/ganache
description: A fully migrated Ganache with all DAOstack base contracts migrated and an example DAO.

config.mnemonic: behave pipe turkey animal voyage dial relief menu blush match jeans general

scripts.prepublish: npm run migrate -- --provider http://localhost:8545 && node set-version.js
scripts.build:docker: npm run prepublish && docker build . -t daostack/ganache:$(cat package.json | jq -r '.version')
scripts.publish:docker: npm run build:docker && docker push daostack/ganache:$(cat package.json | jq -r '.version')

author: Matan Tsuberi <tsuberim@gmail.com>
